page.title: 18FARMING IN EMSWORTH
page.content: The farming industry in Emsworth is very little.There are three main farms.,one of which is Coldharbour Farm.{Cattle,horses}and{sheep}are the main produce.There a few small holdings in this area,one being Southleigh Farm at the end of Hallett Road, ,Warblington.The produce here is {fruit }and {vegetables}.Another small farm in Emsworth is at the top of Hollybank Lane.The produce here is just cattle,although the owners let fields for the use of horses. There are many other fields and paddocks in this area which are used for rough grazing.
